  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2854</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Leisure Time</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Freizeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Temps Libre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tempo De Lazer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tempo libero</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελεύθερος χρόνος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tiempo Libre</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan for building a questionaire to find out the leisure time activities of students in the class and comparing it to that of an Australian student. Incudes an assesment rubric and actual examples</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">questionaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">comparison</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">assessment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lektionplan für das Aufbauen eines 
questionaire, um die Freizeitaktivitäten der Kursteilnehmer in der 
Kategorie herauszufinden und das Vergleichen es mit dem eines 
australischen Kursteilnehmers. Incudes eine assesment Rubrik und
tatsächlichen Beispiele</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon pour établir un questionaire 
pour découvrir les activités de temps libre des étudiants dans la 
classe et le comparer à celui d'un étudiant australien. 
Incudes une rubrique d'assesment et des exemples réels</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição para construir um 
questionaire para encontrar para fora as atividades do tempo de lazer 
dos estudantes na classe e compará-lo àquele de um estudante 
australian. Incudes um rubric do assesment e uns exemplos reais</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione per lo sviluppo del 
questionaire per scoprire le attività di tempo libero degli allievi 
nel codice categoria e confrontarlo a quello di un allievo 
australiano. Incudes una rubrica di assesment e gli esempi 
reali</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για την οικοδόμηση ενός 
ερωτηματολογίου για να ανακαλύψει τις δραστηριότητες ελεύθερου 
χρόνου των σπουδαστών στην κλάση και τη σύγκριση του με αυτό 
ενός αυστραλιανού σπουδαστή. Incudes μια ρουμπρίκα 
assesment και πραγματικά παραδείγματα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de la lección para construir un 
questionaire para descubrir las actividades del tiempo libre de 
estudiantes en la clase y compararlo a el de un estudiante 
australiano. Incudes una rúbrica del assesment y ejemplos 
reales</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">questionaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vergleich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einschätzung</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">questionaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
